Information.Title: What is SupaDupaMinter?
Information.Description: This is set of tools for The Open Network blockchain.

InteractContracts.Title: Interact with TON contracts
InteractContracts.Description: Application generates UI for contract ABI. Useful for testing contracts.

DeployJetton.Title: Deploy TON Jetton
DeployJetton.Description: You can launch new jetton in The Open Network.

OpenSource.Title: Open Source
OpenSource.Description: This website is Free and Open-Source and published in our Github repo

WorkInProgress.Title: Work in progress!
WorkInProgress.Description: Be careful! This application uses Testnet version of TON Blockchain. Because it's not 100% ready yet.
WorkInProgress.LinkText: If you found bug or typo please open an issue in Github

Information.Title: What is it?
Information.Description:
Using this tool you can create your own token in The Open Network blockchain.

How?

  • At first you need to connect your TON wallet.
  • Come up with name and description for your future token, fill in the fields in form and press "Deploy" button
  • You will need to pay a small network fee, after which your token will be created

Decentralized.Title: 100% On-Chain
Decentralized.Description:
Jetton is designed to store full metadata in blockchain.
It means that your jetton is not depends from hostings status.
Metadata stores directly in TON storage. So your jetton will depend only from TON blockchain.

Managable.Title: Easy manageable
Managable.Description: It is good for DAO because this smart contract have flexible API for jetton management

OpenSource.Title: Open Source
OpenSource.Description: Jetton source code is Free and Open-Source and published in our Github repos! If you want, you can contibute to it!

WorkInProgress.Title: Work in progress!
WorkInProgress.Description: Be careful! This application uses Testnet version of TON Blockchain. Because it's not 100% ready yet.
WorkInProgress.LinkText: If you found bug or typo please open an issue in Github

NewJettonForm.JettonName_HelpText: It will be full name of jetton
NewJettonForm.JettonSymbol_HelpText: Short jetton code for wallets. Usually couple of symbols
NewJettonForm.JettonDescription_Placeholder: This is the best token in The Open Network!!!
NewJettonForm.JettonMaxSupply_HelpText: How many tokens will be allowed to mint

DevTools.DefaultText: Choose operation which you want to execute to jetton contract
DevTools.NoSourceCode: Source code of this contract has not published to TON Verifier. So this tool using default ABI.
